title: Any ideas of great, award winning logo websites?
content:
Hi all,

Just wanted to know if anyone out there in cyberland know of any websites that showcase award winning logos, or display an archive of what has been created over the years. Sometime this is inspirational to us designers...(besides that of buying new books every single month which most often don't show the 'best of the best')?

J
author: justinole

comments.content:
May not be the kind of website "you are" looking for. But its worth visiting.  
 [http://brandinfection.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120226072711/http:/brandinfection.com/ "http://brandinfection.com/")

Maybe not award winning, but a great site regarding logo and branding:

Identityworks  
 [http://www.identityworks.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120226072711/http:/www.identityworks.com/ "http://www.identityworks.com/")

hey guys,

thanks very much for the input....

J
